document.full_text: a widening cloud of radiation on tuesday added to the misery of millions of people in japan's devastated northeast, already short of water and food and trying to keep warm in near-freezing temperatures.
document.title: worries mount, food runs short for japanese victims
lines_and_colors: a widening cloud of radiation on tuesday added to the misery of millions of people in japan's devastated northeast, already short of water and food and trying to keep warm in near-freezing temperatures.
